panels.description: The number of pods that are up and ready for processing
panels.title: Ready Pods

panels.description: The current number of requests per second
panels.title: Request Rate

panels.description: The max number of overall requests per second
panels.title: Max Response Rate

panels.description: The number of HTTP requests received per second
panels.title: Request Rate

panels.description: The size of the HTTP requests in bytes
panels.title: Request Size

panels.description: The amount of time it takes to process the HTTP request
panels.title: Request Latency

panels.description: The size of the HTTP response in bytes
panels.title: Response Size

panels.description: The number of errors received per second
panels.title: Error Rate

panels.description: The amount of memory consumed by the application
panels.title: Memory Usage

panels.description: The amount of CPU consumed by the application
panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description: The number of threads in use by the JVM
panels.title: Threads

panels.description: The number of open file descriptors used by the process
panels.title: File Descriptors

panels.description: The number of database connections
panels.title: Connection Pool

panels.description: The number of database connections
panels.title: JDBC Connections

panels.description: The amount of time it takes to invoke the Spring Data repository method to execute a query.
panels.title: Query Latency

panels.description: The amount of time the process has been running
panels.title: Uptime

panels.description: The percent of time the value is retrieved from the cache

targets.expr: sum (cache_gets_total{application="$application",cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace",pod=~"$pod",result="hit"}) by (cache_manager, cache) / sum (cache_gets_total{application="$application",cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace",pod=~"$pod"}) by (cache_manager, cache)

panels.title: Cache Hit %

panels.description: The number of entries in the cache
panels.title: Cache Size

panels.description: The number of cache gets per second
panels.title: Cache Get Rate

panels.description: The number of cache puts per second
panels.title: Cache Put Rate

panels.description: The rate of log events written by the application
panels.title: Rate

panels.description: The log events
panels.title: Messages

list.description: Name of the Loki datasource to use
list.label: Loki
list.name: loki

list.description: Name of the Prometheus datasource to use
list.label: Prometheus
list.name: prometheus
